ATTENTION!!!! THE KEYGEN DOES WORK!!!
All you have to do to install the plane and open the Keygen is start your computer in Safe mode. To do this, simply turn off your computer, wait 30 secs, turn it back on and tap the F8 key until a menu come ups. Select "Safe mode", and open the keygen from there! It works! Thanks a lot Samayot, u the man :)
Keygen has virus :((((

**NO THERE IS NOT A VIRUS IN THE KEYGEN.**

Your scanner might be returning a false positive.

Confirmed: Running "CS 757 Block B v1.4.exe" and selecting "Repair"  after completing the install via the instructions, restores the missing AutoPilot readout.

i cant get the insatller and keygen to work.  i put all 4 files in one folder (blocks b,c,e and keygen).. open keygen, choose base, and generate.  i get an error and the keygen closes.  so then i open block B, and i go through installer steps, but it asks me to activate.  i try both onlnine and manual activation and it either asks for my order number (tried random number, nothing) or asks for a .txt file sent from CS... i cant get past any of this, it seems like thekeygen did not do its job.
